Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.data.base.api.queries.sql

Class SqlQuery<T,​R extends java.util.List<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.data.base.api.queries.sql.SqlQuery<T,​R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is a type of values to be selected.

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Function<org.datanucleus.api.jdo.JDOPersistenceManager,​R>, IdSetter
    This class is designed to perform a query to select list of stored objects/list os stored field values by sql

    • Method Detail

      • bySql

        public static <T extends PersistableObject> SqlQuery<T,​java.util.List<T>> bySql​(java.lang.Class<T> classOfRequestedValue,
                                                                                      java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                      KeepResultPersistent keepResultPersistent,
                                                                                      java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Constructs an object that performs sql query to select list of stored objects.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of retrieved objects
        Parameters:
        classOfRequestedValue - is a type of objects to be returned
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter mask (?) is supported. It is important!:

        Sql query should be defined as below

        'Select * from Persons...'
        parameters - is an array of query parameters. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=?'

        Returns:
        new SqlQuery

      • bySql

        public static <T extends PersistableObject> SqlQuery<T,​java.util.List<T>> bySql​(java.lang.Class<T> classOfRequestedValue,
                                                                                      java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                      KeepResultPersistent keepResultPersistent,
                                                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​?> parameters)
        Constructs an object that performs sql query to select list of stored objects.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of retrieved objects
        Parameters:
        classOfRequestedValue - is a type of objects to be returned
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter naming is supported. It is important!:

        Sql query should be defined as below

        'Select * from Persons...'
        parameters - is a map of parameter names and values. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=:paramName'

        Returns:
        new SqlQuery

      • bySql

        public static SqlQuery<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>,​TableResultList> bySql​(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                     java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Constructs an object that performs sql query to select list of lists. Each list item contains raw objects as they actually stored without any deserialization.
        Parameters:
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter mask (?) is supported.
        parameters - is an array of query parameters. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=?'

        Returns:
        new SqlQuery

      • bySql

        public static SqlQuery<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>,​TableResultList> bySql​(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​?> parameters)
        Constructs an object that performs sql query to select list of lists. Each list item contains raw objects as they actually stored without any deserialization.
        Parameters:
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter naming is supported.
        parameters - is a map of parameter names and values. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=:paramName'

        Returns:
        new SqlQuery
